page.shortlink: api objects security object reset password method
page.description: Reset the user's password to a generated password.
page.syntax: Context.Security.ResetPassword as C (UserName as C, PasswordAnswer as C = null_value())

argument.name: PasswordAnswer
argument.description: The value must match the password answer set for the user when the selected membership provider requires a password answer for password reset. The match is case-insensitive for SqlServerMembership provider. This is the provider used when the publish profile uses "SqlServer" for the Membership provider.

page.discussion: Context.Security.ResetPassword() reset the user's password to a generated password. If a password answer is required PasswordAnswer must be supplied. The return value is the newly generated password. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
